Class Room

java.lang.Object
Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Room extends Object implements Serializable
Class used to implement rooms' behavior, values, fields and their methods
See Also:

    • canAccess

      public boolean canAccess(Player player, Scanner scanner)
      Method used to determine, whether the player can access the room
      Parameters:
      player - Who is trying to access the room
      scanner - Scanner
      Returns:
      boolean true/false based on whether the room is/n't null, locked, or the player tried to unlock the room lock

    • canSearchSpot

      Parameters:
      spotName - name of the search spot player wants to search
      player - Who is trying to search the spot
      scanner - Scanner
      Returns:
      true/false based on whether player can search the spot or not
